name: Marble Lines Shoot
description:
Your goal is to eliminate all the marbles before they fall into the hole.You'll get higher score if you make more combos. Don't let the ball chain reach the end of the path.

How to play:
1.Tap the screen where you want to shoot.
2.Match 3 or more same color marbles to eliminate them.
3.Create Combos to cause chain reaction and earn more scores.
4.Clear out the entire chain.

Features:
1. Very easy to play but hard to perfect.
2. 100 challenging levels.
3.T hrilling ancient egypt and mystical jungle.
